Test Name: Hepatitis E Virus (HEV) IgM Antibody Confirmation, Serum
Purpose: To confirm the presence of Hepatitis E Virus IgM antibodies in serum samples using ELISA.
Container: Gold-top serum separator tube (SST) or red-top tube without anticoagulant
Equipment: HEV IgM ELISA kit, microplate reader (450 nm), incubator (37 Â°C), pipettes, plate washer
